location.name: Endor
location.description: Endor is a forested moon orbiting the gas giant planet of Endor in the Outer Rim Territories. The Ewok village, the Death Star shield generator bunker, and the lush forest terrain. Endor is the location of the Battle of Endor, a critical event in the Star Wars saga, where the Rebel Alliance defeated the Galactic Empire.
